### Fortnite Basics
- Learn to build **quickly**
- Master the weapons

Fortnite Basics

  • Learn to build quickly
  • Master the weapons
MD2HTML
Fortnite tips include: _always move_, don't stand still too long!
Fortnite tips include: <u>always move</u>, don't stand still too long!
MD2HTML
[Fortnite Champions](https://fortnite.com) **dominate** the arena
Fortnite Champions dominate the arena
MD2HTML

## Top Fortnite Strategies
1. Understand the map
2. **Use cover** effectively

  2. Use cover effectively

Explore new areas like <u>the haunted forest</u> in Fortnite.

Fortnite Battle Royale: Last one standing wins!

- Practice with different weapons

Learn to navigate Fortnite's ever-changing landscape.

Fortnite strategy: always have an exit plan.
